lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qau Aksmwq bwdr audoq hoq ggn Gtw GmMf krq ibQwr jI
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Akasamaat Baadar Udot Hota , Gagan Ghataa Ghamand Karat Bidaar Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as deep dark clouds appear in the sky all of a sudden and spread themselves in all the directions.

lines.gurmukhi: qwhI qy sbd Duin Gn grjq Aiq cMcl cirqR dwmnI cmqkwr jI
lines.transliteration_english: Taahee Tay Sabad Dhouni Ghan Garajat Ati , Chanchal Charitr Daamanee Chamatakaar Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Their thunder produces a very strong sound and sprightly lightning flashes.

lines.gurmukhi: brKw AMmiRq jl mukqw kpUr qw qy AauKDI aupwrjnw Aink pRkwr jI
lines.transliteration_english: Barakhaa Anmrit Jal Moukataa Kapoor Taa Tay , Aoukhadhee Oupaarajanaa Anik Prakaar Jee ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Then sweet, cold, nectar-like raindrops from where a swati drop falls on oyster to produce a pearl, camphor when it falls on a plantain beside producing many useful herbs.

lines.gurmukhi: idib dyh swD jnm mrn rihq jg pRgtq krby kau praupkwr jI ]325]
lines.transliteration_english: Dibi Dayh Saadh Janam Maran Rahit Jaga , Pragatat Karabay Kau Paraoupakaar Jee ?325?

Shabad OS B.translation: Like good-doer cloud, the body of Guru-conscious disciple is divine. He is free from the cycle of birth and death. He comes to this world to do good. He helps others reach and realise Lord. (325)
